http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/78827

You must ski and collect weapons (example. m4a1, ak47, grenades, p90 etc.) and killing other players from enemy team.
You must run from running rocks (balls), if rock will hit you - you will die (nice fly ^^.)

The texture "props from fpsbanana" is not valid, its from other my map (on this map there are no any props from fpsbanana :D)

For better gameplay set these commands to 100 value:
sv_airaccelerate
sv_wateraccelerate

Without these commands you can play too, but its more harder ;)

If you will upload this map to your server please tell me :)

Thanks.

===================
Tranquility Gaming Community
 


Objective:
==========

 This is a course map based on a sketchy, playful texture pack.



Special Thanks
==============

---   Haiden - Twat who requested this shit and made this... box of text.

Side Note:
==========

  Mother fucker. I'm on my 4th fix. This is really pissing me off. Fall damage being disabled SHOULD be working now. If it's not, please tell me. For some reason it just wasn't working. Or maybe I'm fucking retarded. Made some of the traps more noob friendly, removed 64 unit jumps, removed unneeded textures, and something I'm probably forgetting to mention.

The lighting can be dealt with at another time as it really isn't that important.

BETA MAP
mg_skeet_shoot_beta

By: D-PUNK

Glowing openings teleport you between the sky bunker and terrorist spawn.
Glowing halls in CT spawn push you up the ramp to launch you


CT's get launched off ramps into the air over a pool, which has targets on the bottom.
Landing on a target will teleport the CT's to the T spawn where they can then teleport to the AWP bunker.
Missing the target will send you back to spawn to try again.

T's leave spawn and try to snipe the CT's as they fly through the air trying to land on the target.
Watch you back, a CT may hit a target and be coming to knife you.



GOAL: kill all

CT's - launch out the ramps and try to land on the targets
T's - shoot and kill CT's as the are flying



Install: Place the '.bsp' and '.nav' files in your cstrike maps folder

default location "Program Files\Steam\steamapps\~username~\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps"

Assign 2 bots to Terrorists(any more and they start to get stuck inside each other) and then just shoot the crap out of the bots. The teleport to the right of the spawns will take you to the shotgun room.


Goal: Shoot 'em in the head.

Simon Says. Everyone knows it. Everyone loved it.

Just do what it tells you. After 60 Seconds it pauses for a few seconds, then it starts again - faster. If you survive untill the end, the middle opens for a knife fight.

Thanks alot to Fibbs for explaining how to make random stages.

Have Fun. If you want to use this for a multigame map or edit it - ask me , i will probably say yes.

Valley of the Cult, Nippon
Kamakura Era, 1291 CE

A forest spirit once spoke of the belief holding more power than the blade. The Oni cult may very well prove this warning to be true as it grows in number. Oni Priests have been spreading their influence by burning a hallucinogenic herb in villages, turning peasants into frenzied zealots. More and more people are growing dependent on the drug, becoming puppets for their new masters.

An order from the Shogunate has been issued to the Togakure-ryu to investigate the cult and discover its true intent. Genin have been sent to the secluded valley to steal a sacred scroll and return to their handler.


GAMEPLAY:

There are (3) Counter-Terrorists (shinobi) versus up to (30) Terrorists (cultists).
Counter-Terrorists have three main weapons attached to knives that they can use, while Terrorists are given one specialized knife designed to catch Counter-Terrorists. All other Terrorists are normal players with knives.

The actual game play is dynamic depending on the amount of players present. When there are ten or more Terrorists (cultists) then the main game mode will be enabled. This game mode, known as 'scroll mode', is designed to utilize the Counter-Terrorists (shinobi) sneak abilities along with their deadly arsenal to make for an interesting user experience. While scroll mode is enabled, the Counter-Terrorist must steal one of three scrolls by touching them and then escape to a palisade gate that opens once one of the scrolls are taken. There is a scroll located in the Great Oni Temple, the War & Painting Room, and the Tengu Pagoda. The palisade gate is located behind the Terrorist spawn, near the Pagoda, and is closed until a scroll is captured by one of the Counter-Terrorists. 

If there are not enough players (less than 10 Terrorists) then team deathmatch mode will be enabled.

WEAPONS:

There are four known weapons available, along with a secret weapon.
CT PUSH Sword: A skilled practitioner in taijutsu, the shinobi can push victims away from her to keep the enemy at bay. Right-click to use. 5 second cool down.
CT POISON Sword: A deadly poison has been concocted by the Togakure ryu to aid the shinobi on their mission. A fine mist will spray in front of the user that will quickly kill opponents upon contact. Right-click to use. 15 second cool down.
CT SPEED Sword: Calling upon the strength of forest spirits, the shinobi can boost his speed for a short amount of time, thus escaping even the fastest of opponents. 2x speed boost for 5 seconds. Right-click to use. 20 second cool down.
CT Night Vision: Shinobi can see easily in the dark. Cultists can't.

T SAMURAI PRIEST Sword: The Samurai Priest is a fast and agile adversary and can take quite a deal of punishment. 1.25x constant speed boost + slow heal over time. Can heal team mates. 

There may or may not be a secret dagger available to the shinobi. Sources say that not only does it offer constant healing qualities, but it can transport a shinobi and her victims far into the sky when invoked.

QUICKNOTES:

-Scroll Mode-
Counter-Terrorist objectives: 
* Steal a scroll by touching it.
* Travel to the palisade gate and go through it.
* Do not take too long or you will commit suicide.

Terrorist objectives:
* Keep the Counter-Terrorists from taking a scroll and escaping.

-Team Deathmatch Mode-
Kill the other team in the allotted time.

-CT Weapons-
Right-click to use.

MANI Server Plugin is required to fully utilize gameplay. This is due to a special command that automatically swaps out Counter-Terrorists every round to eliminate team hogging.

Cts start off in a bunker and T's start off on the opposite end. The T's attack and can right click with their knife to spawn a shield once per round infront of them. This map depends on terrorist teamplay and can be lots of fun tactically. If the T's make it to the opposite end they can press a button to nuke the cts bunker, or they could just shoot all the cts. Its set up for 16 T 10 Ct with an 8 to 5 suggested T to CT ratio. (Can't add anymore spawns due to sdk limits on the shields sorry.)

Set for up to 26 spawns- Plays best with more people
Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here at Tomgreen's|Mini Game|Fast DL|Great Job server 76.73.27.235:27015
and my steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918
Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on simular ideas ect..

MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL_V2 By LunarKirby And Whazaaaaa ------------------------------- Dedicated to SteamGamers ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is an All-In-One / Multimap for minigames, the map has 10 minigames, five made by LunarKirby and the other five by Whazaaaaa. Each map is based on skill of some sort, BHOP, SURF, Shooting etc. There are 64 spawns and the map has lighting with colours to create ambience. There are some custom textures in some map and some maps there are none. There are 3 musics that are chosen randomly at the start of a minigame. The minigames are: LunarKirby Climb Deathrun Race Slide Surf Whazaaaaa AwpBattle Bhop IceSkate KnifeFight ScoutBattle Authors Comment When we first started the map [August 2009] we were sure that we could make this and we did eventually, one thing we did not expect was it to take this long....... After one Year we finally managed to finish the map, the delay was not because of difficulty but with laziness.. yes, we are both very very lazy mappers. We worked on the map then we stopped then we worked on it again, alot of times. The main key that kept us going was the support of people, not really support, they kind of forced us to map. So this map took 1 year for us to make, and man we are so glad. -.- During the development of this map we ran into a problem, MAX_PLANE, yes our map had to many brush faces. The original map began with 10 maps like today, some odd minigames. Then one day I decided to add more minigames and the total went to 18. We finished all 18 maps compiled it all together and boom, we hit the error. So we made a plan to Split the map into two, one map with skill minigames and the other with fun minigames, named. MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL And MG_SG_ALLINONE_FUN So we did that and here we are the release if the first Half, SKILL. We'll release the other half next time, proberly taking another 1 or 2 years. Thank you for downloading our map [if you do...] And hey dood, i know, tl;dr. Map Properties Name: MG_SG_ALLINONE_SKILL Type: MG - Multimap / All-In-One Size: 45Mb Content: 10 Minigames Custom Textures Music Awesome Themes and designs PLEASE DOWNLOAD PLEASE PLAY PLEASE COMMENT THANK YOU ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- MG_SG_ALINONE_SKILL_V2 Made by [SG] LunarKirby [SG-A] Whazaaaaa www.SteamGamers.com Minigame IP: 72.26.196.164:27015 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- THIS MAP TOOK 1 YEAR OMFG

This version of the map has been fixed and no longer contains the weapon bug, thanks for downloading

This is a multi MG made for 32 player servers (although can fit up to 64 players), that is based inside a scary machine type world. It has 8 Mini-Games which are as follows:

1. Long Jump, good ol' long jumpin' 2. Obstacles, from all sides (gets progressively harder) 3. Bunny Hop (which also gets progressively harder the further you get) 4. Mosh Pit, the most insane knife fight you've ever had, especialy on large servers 5. Dark Scout, 0 G scout towers 6. Race, a short but fierce race for weapons 7. King of the Hill, a fight for a capture point with shotguns 8. Fall, the infinite free falling with guns, what could be better

The map has many AFK features including auto MG selection and it will also give out weapons in certain MGs if it isn't completed in a certain time. It also has custom sounds for each different MG, which makes it very ambient and sometimes quite scary. Hope you like it,

Severn

The download contains the .BSP and also a compressed .BZ2 version.

_aArchiveFileTree: MG Serpentis Temple V1 - Full Changelog.txt

_sText:
Serpentis Temple is a different kind of Mini Game that plays very much like an adventure for 6 to 64 players.
Take in mind that some degree of Teamwork is required and the way some of the rooms are designed mandates a minimum of 6 players to reach the end without cheats.
There is only 1 Team and all players fight together to conquer the traps and dangers they will encounter in the Serpentis Temple.
After completing a series of trials in 8 different rooms you will get to face one of the Goddess of the Serpentine people.

This map includes:

- 64 Spawns.
- Custom Particles.
- Custom Models.
- 1 Custom Skin (obtainable by touching a crystal or with admin powers).
- Lots of traps.
- 8 Trial-Rooms (7 of them requiring 2 or more players)
- Shortcuts and Teleports for faster pacing.
- A Boss Fight in the very end.

Take in mind this map usually takes at least 2 hours to complete from beginning to end (you let me know your personal records, no cheating!) and it may even take longer if you aren't familiar with the map.
Some rooms are extremely hard if you don't have people that are good at strafing, ladder jumping, running, dodging things that want to kill you or just plain team communication.

Enjoy!
(Or suffer).

Me (Luffaren) and Kaemon did this map together. It's a pretty neat obstacle/puzzle course with a surprise in the end (it's worth getting there) This map requires teamwork and skill to beat, it's possible with at least 2 pro's as well.

  • 64 player spawns
  • Particles
  • 3d skybox

Please visit www.rafuron.wordpress.com for more information about us and our mapping, feel free to leave a comment about bugs/improvement ideas as well.

Have a good one! ;)

A group of corrupt people captured the friends of some policemen for knowing too much. When rescuing them, one of the prisoners takes advantage of the moment when the guard opens the door and manages to escape. Just when his cellmates decide to follow him, the door closes automatically. 

In the case of TT: Some players will spawn in the cell and must escape in time while others must go to rescue them in a drone. 

In the case of the CT: they must collect their weapons and return to the starting place and wait for the emergency door to open.

Songs: 

Band - Linkin Park         Songs: Points Of Authority
                                                      Nobodys Listening
                                                      Faint

Fun map with boats.
Each team has 8 boats, each boat must be controled by 2 players. One player drives the boat, the other controls the canon.

To destroy a boat you need to hit it 3 times, when boat is destroyed all on it will die.

--V1--
-First Version

--V2--
-Increased maxplayers to 32
-Increased boats to 16
-New canon structure, easier to enter.

-Added explosions on boats.
-Removed timelimit.
-Removed hurt on sea.

-Now AFKs will fall to sea and die after 90 seconds
-Boats move faster
-Canons move faster
-Added cameras on boats and canons to improve driver vision
-Added instrucions when player enter in the boat or canon

Old MG map I made a long time ago but am just now putting it out.
Please tell me if there are any problems.
-
Both teams, CT's and T's race each other and once you get to the end, you will get to choose between either an Awp or an M4A1 - Both come with a Deagle and a Knife, once you get your guns you get to run and find the opposite team and kill them. 
-
Some parts of the map has a choice of BHOP or Long Jump - map also has Invisible Maze - Lasers - Ladders.
-
Fastest person wins, but there are many obstacles. If you know where to go, know how to water strafe, ladder strafe, longjump, and bhop you will be first.

It's a very HARD obstacle maps !

This map is dedicated to my friend ScHoOufi

Map based on school theme, here is overview of the map: [CLICK ME](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UJHUqgpkRYE "Click me")

It too me 3 days to make

Here is what is inside the map:

- Random music that plays every round (7 different songs)
- 17 traps/things that will make your way more difficult
- Hidden bonus
- Alot of sound effects
- From the last update, it's no longer annoying
- Spawn protection
- Vent maze with random ways (changes every round)

The map has 11 traps with different enviroments. Some are easy, some are pretty hard. I made the bhop part to teleport players back to start because using a trigger_hurt would be kinda hard for players. The explosion in the background city is just a random thought.

Music can be turned off from CSS settings.

Please report any bugs or so to me in comments.

Version 1.1
==================
- Removed the displacement hole at spawn and replaced it with a brush hole. This was done because some players got stuck in the hole for some reason.


- Black room with lights has a sprite trail which will guide you through the correct route.

- Made some platforms at the first climb wider and longer, so it will be a bit easier to climb.

- Now many people can finish the map with points and correct ending. The hole will be different every time, so nobody can "leech" their way to victory.

Version 1.2
==================

- Fixed: the correct way in the final trap didn't change.

- Added a wall to prevent two or more people from going in to press the final button

- Added a new bhop trap in a rocky pit

I was disappointed that the other Saw maps didn't incorporate enough actual Saw content into them, so I decided to do my own. mg_saw_ultimate features actual sound clips from the movies, real traps from them, and real characters. 

There are multiple traps to navigate and 'head traps' on some of them, where you will need to complete the course within a given amount of time before it goes off.

You must decide at certain points in the map to save or kill certain characters, and your decision could have a vital impact on your success or failure in the level.

I have added a multitude of invisible buttons on the map that display information to the player when pressed (e.g. pressing E on the body in the spawn room). See if you can find them all! They are typically on objects that stand out, so you don't need to spam press everything you see.

Can you make it all the way to the end?
